title: FCC ID
extract: An FCC ID is a unique identifier assigned to a device registered with the United States Federal Communications Commission. For legal sale of wireless deices in the US, manufacturers must: Have the device evaluated by an independent lab to ensure it conforms to FCC standards.
extract_html: An FCC ID is a unique identifier assigned to a device registered with the United States Federal Communications Commission. For legal sale of wireless deices in the US, manufacturers must: Have the device evaluated by an independent lab to ensure it conforms to FCC standards.
